title: Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking Integrated Project-Based Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational programming concepts and linguistic background knowledge
context.additional_context: Application of AI/CT tools in a digitally enabled collaborative learning environment for solving language domain problems.

learning_goals: Students can design pattern analysis and problem-solving processes for linguistic data using natural language processing tools
Learners can complete creative projects (e.g., chatbot development) based on computational thinking using AI-powered language models
Teams can write evaluation reports applying AI-CT (Computational Thinking) integrated approaches to language domain problems through collaboration
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
